1.content: One day Billy was on his computer like usual, looking up body swap stories was a normal thing for him. He always fantasized about becoming a girl, boobs....a vagina. He loved them all and if he could become a girl he'd take the chance, especially if it was one of the girls he fantasized about. It said there was a remote that could swap the bodies of any two. Even if they weren't both willing to go through with it. "Huh...." said Billy. "It's probably fake like all the others, but this one is the first that has said only one person had to be willing to go through with it" He checked how much it was and it said it was free, no credit card required at all or even address. "Wha!? How is that suppose to work!?" He clicked the okay button and it said "Are you SURE that you want to go through with this? Your life may never be the same again" "Ah hell" said Billy. "I might as well try it, if my dreams can finally come true then...." He clicked yes and it said 'Okay....have fun, Billy." All of a sudden Billy's entire computer screen started to have strange colors fizz around the screen and finally his entire room. "What the fuck is going on!?" said Billy in a panic, he went to go for the door but all of a sudden he passed out. In his mind he saw an imagine of a girl handing him a remote and saying "It's your choice from here on....but don't be suprised if you change in more ways than just a body swap" Billy then saw the images of 5 girls he knew. His sister Izzy, His crush Amanda, his sisterlike friend Zoe, his friend Chloe and his slutty friend Amber. "So....who will you choose?" said the mysterious girl. Billy, then shocked at what was going on, found he couldn't say anything, he was mute in the world he was in, and all he could do was choose. He thought about it long and hard, but finally he choose he would swap with.....

11.title: Amanda

13.content:
Billy chose to go for Zoe, seeing her as a friend he wanted to know in another way. "Very well, enjoy your new life." The girl replied with a mysterious smile as everything turned white for Billy. He felt himself being forced away from his own body, everything turned dark as he felt being pulled inside the body of Zoe. Everything turned dark as Billy's astral body was being transported to his new physical body.

All of a sudden Billy felt a shock going through his body and everything was normal. Or was it? Billy looked around himself but he wasn't home anymore. Not to mention he was holding a phone in his hand. Looking at the phone it displayed a conversation with Chloe, one of his other friends. Chloe was asking when they would go shopping. Shopping? Chloe never asked him to do that. Billy then noticed his hands, they were way smaller and daintier than before. Did his wish really worked? Billy stood up and walked over to the huge mirror in the room. Billy looked in the mirror and saw the reflection of Zoe staring back at her. Billy touched his face and saw Zoe's reflection doing the same thing.

info.brief_description: (500 GP PER CHAPTER) 22 year old boy named Billy who finds a remote that swaps bodies.
info.description:
Billy, a 22 year old finds a remote one day that can swap bodies with anyone of his choice, will Billy use this remote to take advantage of others lives? Or will the longer he stays in someones body, the longer he becomes more and more like them?'

RULES:

Sex is allowed

The longer Billy is in one of the girls bodies, the more he becomes just like them, from personality, to interests.

As long as Billy is in one of the girls bodies, it is more than welcome that he become intimate/attracted with others males in the story, he is becoming them little by little after all!

Lesbian activity is also more than welcome.

COHERENT AND IMPACTFUL CHAPTERS WILL BE REWARDED 500 GP
